review: I love the Amazon Fire TV. I have a Roku 2, a Chromecast, and also The Amazon Fire. I love the voice command that is lightning fast. Once you set up your account (which is easy) and pair it with your Showtime and HBO accounts, you have access to thousands of hours of entertainment, not to mention all the Amazon Prime offerings if you don't have HBO or Showtime. It is much easier to use than Chromecast (my wife is not a techie and doesn't like to have to use a smartphone to control the TV), and the voice command makes it easier to use than Roku 2. I love all three and use them interchangeably without any difficulty but for my wife the AMAZON FIRE is her favorite. They all work seamlessly with Netflix so if you don't have cable, no problem, you can spend your days on Netflix or Hulu (if you subscribe). These devices make it much easier to cut the cable.
